title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Dresden, Germany
content:
Support us! BikeRumor may earn a small commission from affiliate links in this article. Learn more.

Photo submitted by Hagen Hirche, “it’s sunny here but days are getting colder. During autumn and winter it’s always either sunny and cold or rainy and relatively warm. Trails can be really muddy here, but we have a lot to pick from: gravel, dirt roads, singletracks and even some paved stuff 😉 So you can always find a route that works for an effective bike therapy. Didn’t even touch my energy bars today since I could always pick some apples along the way.”

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.
author: Kristi Benedict
